results.title: 내면 분석가 (그림자 정신과의사형)
results.desc:
당신은 관찰과 분석의 대가. 감정보다는 구조를 보며, 말수는 적지만 내면은 깊습니다.

대화를 듣기보단 '해석'하며, 타인의 숨은 감정도 잘 읽어냅니다.

results.title: 데이터 마법사 (통계지배자형)
results.desc:
당신은 수치와 패턴을 읽어내는 마법사. 직관보다 근거가 먼저입니다.

무엇이든 '이게 왜 그런지를 먼저 묻는 사람'.

results.title: 감정 연출가 (에너지 조율가형)
results.desc:
당신은 '분위기'라는 무형의 언어를 가장 잘 아는 사람.

대화에 생기를 불어넣고, 무거운 자리를 유쾌하게 만드는 감정 연출의 마스터입니다.

results.title: 전투 조율가 (냉정한 사령관형)
results.desc:
큰 판을 보는 능력자. 감정보다는 '판단'과 '결정'을 선호합니다.

리더십이 자연스럽게 발휘되며, 위기 상황에서도 평정을 잃지 않습니다.

results.title: 평화 유지군 (감정 중재자형)
results.desc:
당신은 누구와도 갈등을 만들지 않는 감성의 중재자.

갈등 회피가 아니라, '조율'을 선택하는 지혜로운 사람입니다.

results.title: 기획자 (창조 설계자형)
results.desc:
모든 아이디어의 구조와 미래를 먼저 상상해보는 사람.

당신은 현실보단 '그럴듯한 청사진'을 먼저 그리는 타입입니다.

results.title: Inner Analyst (Shadow Psychiatrist Type)
results.desc:
You are a master of observation and analysis. You see structure rather than emotion, speak little but have deep inner thoughts.

You 'interpret' conversations rather than just listen, and read others' hidden emotions well.
results.subDesc: You 'interpret' conversations rather than just listen, and read others' hidden emotions well.
results.imageDesc: Black hoodie, quiet eyes, analysis notes on desk

results.title: Data Wizard (Statistics Dominator Type)
results.desc:
You are a wizard who reads numbers and patterns. Evidence comes before intuition.

You're the person who first asks 'why is this so' about anything.
results.subDesc: You're the person who first asks 'why is this so' about anything.
results.imageDesc: Laptop with Excel open, notebook with code-like writing

results.title: Emotion Director (Energy Coordinator Type)
results.desc:
You know the intangible language called 'atmosphere' best.

You breathe life into conversations and are a master of emotional direction who makes heavy situations cheerful.
results.subDesc: You breathe life into conversations and are a master of emotional direction who makes heavy situations cheerful.

results.title: Battle Coordinator (Cool Commander Type)
results.desc:
A person with big picture capabilities. Prefers 'judgment' and 'decision' over emotion.

Leadership comes naturally and you don't lose composure even in crisis situations.
results.subDesc: Leadership comes naturally and you don't lose composure even in crisis situations.

results.title: Peacekeeper (Emotional Mediator Type)
results.desc:
You are an emotional mediator who creates no conflict with anyone.

You are a wise person who chooses 'coordination' rather than conflict avoidance.
results.subDesc: You are a wise person who chooses 'coordination' rather than conflict avoidance.

results.title: Planner (Creative Designer Type)
results.desc:
A person who first imagines the structure and future of all ideas.

You're the type who draws 'plausible blueprints' first rather than reality.
results.subDesc: You're the type who draws 'plausible blueprints' first rather than reality.
